value.label: Activation of certificate due,Please set certificate status to "valid", check expiry date and allocate Buyer Protection products in accordance with the Buyer Protection model. , Activation due

Audit announced,A while ago became a member of Trusted Shops. On your wish we had postponed the start of the certification of your online shop {0}.

May we now start the audit? Then please let us know. We’re looking forward to hearing from you.
